scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.prettier: concurrently "cd client && npm run prettier" "cd server && npm run prettier"
scripts.test:client: cd client && npm run generate && npm test
scripts.test:server: cd server && npm run generate && npm test
